00025 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00026 #include <thrust/iterator/detail/constant_iterator_base.h>

00028 namespace thrust

00095 template<typename Value,
00096          typename Incrementable = use_default,
00097          typename System = use_default>
00098   class constant_iterator
00099     : public detail::constant_iterator_base<Value, Incrementable, System>::type
00100 {
00103     friend class thrust::experimental::iterator_core_access;
00104     typedef typename detail::constant_iterator_base<Value, Incrementable, System>::type          super_t;
00105     typedef typename detail::constant_iterator_base<Value, Incrementable, System>::incrementable incrementable;
00106     typedef typename detail::constant_iterator_base<Value, Incrementable, System>::base_iterator base_iterator;
00107 
00108   public:
00109     typedef typename super_t::reference  reference;
00110     typedef typename super_t::value_type value_type;
00111 
00118     __host__ __device__
00119     constant_iterator(void)
00120       : super_t(), m_value(){};
00121 
00127     __host__ __device__
00128     constant_iterator(constant_iterator const &rhs)
00129       : super_t(rhs.base()), m_value(rhs.m_value) {}
00130 
00136     template<typename OtherSystem>
00137     __host__ __device__
00138     constant_iterator(constant_iterator<Value,Incrementable,OtherSystem> const &rhs,
00139                       typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible<
00140                         typename thrust::iterator_system<constant_iterator<Value,Incrementable,OtherSystem> >::type,
00141                         typename thrust::iterator_system<super_t>::type
00142                       >::type * = 0)
00143       : super_t(rhs.base()), m_value(rhs.value()) {}
00144 
00154     __host__ __device__
00155     constant_iterator(value_type const& v, incrementable const &i = incrementable())
00156       : super_t(base_iterator(i)), m_value(v) {}
00157 
00166     template<typename OtherValue, typename OtherIncrementable>
00167     __host__ __device__
00168     constant_iterator(OtherValue const& v, OtherIncrementable const& i = incrementable())
00169       : super_t(base_iterator(i)), m_value(v) {}
00170 
00174     __host__ __device__
00175     Value const& value(void) const
00176     { return m_value; }
00177 
00181   protected:
00182     __host__ __device__
00183     Value const& value_reference(void) const
00184     { return m_value; }
00185 
00186     __host__ __device__
00187     Value & value_reference(void)
00188     { return m_value; }
00189   
00190   private: // Core iterator interface
00191     __host__ __device__
00192     reference dereference(void) const
00193     {
00194       return m_value;
00195     }
00196 
00197   private:
00198     Value m_value;
00199 
00202 }; // end constant_iterator

00219 template<typename V, typename I>
00220 inline __host__ __device__
00221 constant_iterator<V,I> make_constant_iterator(V x, I i = int())
00222 {
00223   return constant_iterator<V,I>(x, i);
00224 } // end make_constant_iterator()
00225 
00226 
00236 template<typename V>
00237 inline __host__ __device__
00238 constant_iterator<V> make_constant_iterator(V x)
00239 {
00240   return constant_iterator<V>(x, 0);
00241 } // end make_constant_iterator()
